channel.title: CVE Feed for Castos -- Seriously Simple Podcasting

item.title: CVE-2024-25599|2024-03-28T06:52:19.640Z -- Castos -- Seriously Simple Podcasting
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Castos Seriously Simple Podcasting allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Seriously Simple Podcasting: from n/a through 3.0.2.
